      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String connectToNet(java.lang.String essid, java.lang.String pw)
      Allow us to connect to a net If the credentials are wrong and wasAP == true we go back to AP mode, so that the esp have a neto una loro rete
      java.util.List<WifiNetResource> getAvailableNet() 
      void switchToAP()
      Ci permette di passare in modalità AccessPointMode wpa_cli -iwlan0 disable_network 2 echo albertengopi | sudo -S ip link set dev wlan0 down echo albertengopi | sudo -S ip addr add 192.168.4.1/24 dev wlan0 echo albertengopi | sudo -S systemctl restart dnsmasq.service echo albertengopi | sudo -S systemctl restart hostapd.service

      • getAvailableNet

        public java.util.List<WifiNetResource> getAvailableNet()
        Returns:
        the available net iterating @count times to check the result with more results

      • connectToNet

        public java.lang.String connectToNet(java.lang.String essid,
                                     java.lang.String pw)
        Allow us to connect to a net If the credentials are wrong and wasAP == true we go back to AP mode, so that the esp have a neto una loro rete
        Parameters:
        essid - essid to connect
        pw - pw of the ap
        Returns:
        debugging string

      • switchToAP

        public void switchToAP()
        Ci permette di passare in modalità AccessPointMode

        wpa_cli -iwlan0 disable_network 2 echo albertengopi | sudo -S ip link set dev wlan0 down echo albertengopi | sudo -S ip addr add 192.168.4.1/24 dev wlan0 echo albertengopi | sudo -S systemctl restart dnsmasq.service echo albertengopi | sudo -S systemctl restart hostapd.service
